long_description: These replacement shoulder straps fit the men's REI Mars and Ridgeline packs. With a ''rip-and-stick'' torso adjustment, shoulder strap system easily slides along pack's frame to fit torsos of varying lengths. Precurved, padded shoulder straps match your anatomy for nonbinding comfort on and off the trail. These shoulder straps are not compatible with the 2010 Mars backpack (item #795513).
short_description: These replacement shoulder straps fit the men's REI Mars and Ridgeline packs.
